requestBody.title: Owner creates primary location API Trace

data.instruction: Using agents, create a biz representing The Video Conferencing Auto-Generation. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

data.instruction: Using agents, create a biz representing The QR Code Check-In/Booking. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.
